column3: if there are 17 heritage sites, approximately 3 sites will be affected

column2: Because the average region has fewer than 90 parks, some will likely be affected. In a region with only 17 heritage parks, a small number, approximately 3 would likely be affected due to the limited total of heritage parks.

column3: The relationship between the Total number of Heritage sites (x) and the amount affected by Climate Change (y) is a common cause relationship. An external variable, which is climate change (z), is causing an increase in affected sites (y) out of the total amount of heritage sites (x)

column1: The mean number of total heritage parks is 90.2, but this is skewed by Europe and North America having 573 parks.
The median is 47, which better shows the typical region since it’s not affected by extreme values.
